title: MicroStrategy Bought $593 Million More Bitcoin in November
description: At current prices, MicroStrategy now owns approximately $6.6 billion worth of Bitcoin.

title: Coinbase CEO Is ‘Pretty Optimistic’ on Bitcoin ETF Approval
description: Brian Armstrong told Decrypt that “it feels to me like we’re getting closer to an approval” on a spot Bitcoin ETF.

title: US Prepares to Cut Off Crypto Firms for Illicit Activity
description: US sends a clear message to crypto firms: innovate responsibly or face consequences to safeguard national security and financial stability.

title: AntPool Commits to Refunding User’s 83 BTC Transaction Fee in Landmark Decision
description: In a move that underscores the evolving nature of cryptocurrency transactions and platform accountability, AntPool, a prominent crypto mining platform, has announced its intention to refund an extraordinary transaction fee of 83 Bitcoins (BTC) to an affected user. The decision comes after a user on the platform was charged an unusually high fee for a ... Read more

title: Sui Surpasses $150M in TVL, Showcasing Blistering DeFi Momentum
description: Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, November 30th, 2023, Chainwire Sui, the pioneering Layer 1 blockchain and smart contract platform created by the technology team that emerged from Meta’s Diem Blockchain project, has accelerated beyond expectations in just over six months since its mainnet launch, surpassing $150 million in Total Value Locked (TVL) according to leading DeFi ... title: AI Supercomputing Center to Propel Technological Advancements in Armenia
description: In a significant leap towards technological innovation, Armenia is set to establish an AI Supercomputing Center, as announced by Deputy Speaker of Parliament Hakob Arshakyan. The groundbreaking initiative, with a total budget of $8.5 million, aims to harness the latest technologies and position Armenia as a regional leader in the field of artificial intelligence. Pioneering ... Read more

title: Shiba Inu’s Visionary Leader Aims to Decentralize and Attract 1,000,000,000 Users
description: In the latest edition of the SHIB Magazine, lead developer Shytoshi Kusama revealed his grand and ambitious plan to attract at least a billion users to Shiba Inu and Shibarium. He also has a vision of making Shiba Inu the most decentralized ecosystem, including leveraging the ecosystem’s tokens to initiate elections for governance issues. Shytoshi [...]

title: XLINK Launch: Bridging Bitcoin to Ethereum to Boost DeFi Transactions
description:
XLINK is a native Bitcoin Bridge that connects it to Ethereum’s ecosystem. The launch marks a significant leap forward in the quest for a more interconnected DeFi ecosystem. This article delves into the key features of XLINK. Also, about its impact on Bitcoin transactions in DeFi. Let’s discover more about this important dApp. Bridging Bitcoin […]

title: Circle’s USDC Expands to Cosmos Through New Cross-Chain Transfer Protocol
description:
Stablecoin company Circle says that USDC is now more accessible following the launch of the Cross-Chain Transfer Protocol (CCTP) on the Cosmos (ATOM)-based blockchain Noble. Circle created CCTP to facilitate the movement of the dollar-pegged USDC across different blockchains and Noble is an app chain, a network built to power a single app, that enables […]

The post Circle’s USDC Expands to Cosmos Through New Cross-Chain Transfer Protocol appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
